items.title: Siri新版本将‘依赖’谷歌Gemini (原标题: New Version of Siri to 'Lean' on Google Gemini)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
# Siri新版本将‘依赖’谷歌Gemini，Apple Intelligence展望2026

彭博社的Mark Gurman在其“Power On”时事通讯中，提供了关于Apple Intelligence现状及其2026年计划的最新信息。

## Siri重大更新与发布计划
*   **发布时间**：苹果计划在明年三月（2026年）左右推出其全面升级的Siri版本。
*   **伴随产品**：此次发布将伴随一款新的智能家居显示器产品，该产品将提供扬声器底座和壁挂选项。此外，即将推出的新Apple TV和HomePod mini也将“帮助展示”明年Siri和Apple Intelligence的新功能。

## Siri与谷歌Gemini的深度整合
*   **核心技术**：新版Siri将“依赖”谷歌的Gemini模型，并包含AI驱动的网络搜索功能。
*   **合作模式**：据报道，苹果正在向谷歌付费，以创建一个可在其Private Cloud Compute服务器上运行的定制Gemini模型，为Siri提供支持。
*   **用户体验**：Gurman澄清，这并不意味着Siri将包含谷歌服务或Gemini功能。相反，Siri将仅在后台由Gemini模型提供支持，使其能够通过苹果的用户界面提供用户期望的功能。
*   **专家警告**：Gurman提醒称，“无法保证用户会接受它，它会无缝运行，或者它能弥补Siri品牌多年来的损害。”

![Apple Intelligence General Feature 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/bXt7Maqcc83bP9Cz6gmYvy6hBtE=/400x0/article-new/2024/09/Apple-Intelligence-General-Feature-2.jpg?lossy)

## Apple Intelligence与AI战略
*   **WWDC 2026**：苹果将在六月的年度全球开发者大会上预览iOS 27、macOS 27、watchOS 27及其他操作系统。这些更新显然将重点关注Apple Intelligence的重大更新以及公司的整体AI战略。

## 中国市场面临的挑战
*   **监管问题**：尽管与中国公司建立了合作关系，但Apple Intelligence在中国市场的推出仍受监管问题的困扰，发布时间现在是一个“滚动目标”。

![MacRumors x Bloomberg Banner Warm](https://images.macrumors.com/t/6Ve8995RzEQOT6s7CMze_yE9iJY=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/MacRumors-x-Bloomberg-Banner-Warm.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果计划在2026年3月左右推出Siri的重大更新，新版Siri将“依赖”谷歌的Gemini模型提供AI驱动的网络搜索功能。苹果将为此向谷歌付费，定制Gemini模型并在其私有云上运行，但用户界面仍保持苹果风格。此次更新将伴随新的智能家居产品发布，并聚焦于Apple Intelligence。然而，Siri的品牌修复和中国市场的监管问题仍是挑战。
items.content:
In his "Power On" newsletter, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman today provided an update on the status of Apple Intelligence and the plans for it in 2026.


Apple is still planning to roll out its revamped version of Siri around March of next year. The release should be accompanied by the release of a new smart home display product with speaker-base and wall-mount options. A new Apple TV and HomePod mini, which are set for launch soon, will also "help showcase" next year's new ‌Siri‌ and ‌Apple Intelligence‌ features.

The new version of ‌Siri‌ will apparently "lean" on Google's Gemini and include an AI-powered web search feature. Gurman warned "there's no guarantee users will embrace it, that it will work seamlessly or that it can undo years of damage to the ‌Siri‌ brand."

Apple is said to be paying Google to create a custom Gemini-based model that can run on its Private Cloud Compute servers to power ‌Siri‌. Gurman clarified that this doesn't mean ‌Siri‌ will include Google services or Gemini features. Instead, ‌Siri‌ will simply be powered by a Gemini model in the background, enabling it to deliver the features that users expect with an Apple user interface.

Apple will preview iOS 27, macOS 27, watchOS 27 and other operating systems at its annual Worldwide Developers Conference in June. The updates will apparently focus on major updates to ‌Apple Intelligence‌ and the company's broader AI strategy.

The company is also apparently still running into problems with the launch of ‌Apple Intelligence‌ in China. Despite partnerships with Chinese companies, ‌Apple Intelligence‌ in China is still mired by regulatory issues and the launch is now a "rolling target."

Tags: Apple Intelligence, Bloomberg, Mark Gurman, Siri

items.summary:
### 新款Apple TV和HomePod mini发布在即

根据彭博社记者马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）的最新报道，新款Apple TV和HomePod mini可能最早于本月发布。古尔曼在其“Power On”时事通讯中透露了这一消息，并提供了多项迹象支持这一推测。

#### 关键信息点：

*   **发布时间线：**
    *   古尔曼指出，新款Apple TV和HomePod mini最早可能在本月内推出。
    *   即使未能在2025年底前发布，新品的推出也“不会太远”。

*   **零售店活动：**
    *   苹果零售店计划在11月11日晚进行通宵更新。
    *   此次更新将在闭店后进行，内容包括刷新展示品和为次日摆放新产品。
    *   虽然这可能与假日季的准备工作有关，但也极有可能预示着新款Apple TV和HomePod mini的发布。

*   **库存状况：**
    *   当前型号的Apple TV和HomePod mini库存已变得紧张。
    *   库存紧张通常被视为新版本即将推出的信号。

*   **未来功能支持：**
    *   新款Apple TV和HomePod mini将“有助于展示计划于明年推出的新Siri和Apple Intelligence功能”。

*   **产品发布优先级：**
    *   苹果公司在本周早些时候的财报电话会议中暗示，2026年剩余时间可能不会再有新的Mac产品发布。
    *   这使得新款Apple TV和HomePod mini成为今年（2025年）最有可能发布的苹果产品。

![HomePod mini and Apple TV](https://images.macrumors.com/t/5rfXSM2QqAO6no_HgywubBdBdNm0=/400x0/article-new/2025/01/HomePod-mini-and-Apple-TV.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 彭博社的马克·古尔曼透露，新款Apple TV和HomePod mini可能最早于本月发布。苹果零售店计划在11月11日进行通宵更新，且现有产品库存紧张，均暗示新品即将到来。这些设备将有助于展示明年的新Siri和Apple Intelligence功能。鉴于苹果已暗示2026年不再发布Mac，Apple TV和HomePod mini是今年最可能的剩余产品发布。
items.translated_title: 新款Apple TV和HomePod mini或将很快发布
items.content:
A new Apple TV and HomePod mini could launch as soon as this month, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman today suggested.


In today's "Power On" newsletter, Gurman said that Apple retail stores are planning an overnight refresh on the evening of November 11, where changes will be made after closing, such as refreshing displays and placing new products for the following day.

The timing of the overnight refresh could simply be related to the holiday season, but there is a possibility that it relates to the launch of new ‌Apple TV‌ and ‌HomePod mini‌ models. Gurman notes that inventory of current models has become tight, likely signaling that new versions are on the way. He added that even if they do not launch by the end of 2025, they "shouldn't be far off."

The new ‌Apple TV‌ and ‌HomePod mini‌ will apparently "help showcase the new Siri and Apple Intelligence features planned for next year." During its earnings call earlier this week, Apple seemingly suggested that any more new Macs are off the table for the rest of 2026, making the new ‌Apple TV‌ and ‌HomePod mini‌ the most likely candidates for any remaining Apple product releases this year.

# 2026年苹果产品发布展望

根据彭博社马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）的“Power On”时事通讯，苹果公司计划在2026年推出至少15款新产品，并预计这将是该公司“近年来最关键的年份之一”。这一年将伴随着重要的Apple Intelligence功能推出、App Store面临的严峻监管压力以及新关税的风险。

![Apple Logo Spotlight](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-ExMtbhwKwtSkj33nseqBNpPVP0=/400x0/article-new/2023/09/Apple-Logo-Spotlight.jpg?lossy)

## 2026年上半年产品发布

古尔曼指出，2026年“早期阶段”将迎来一系列重要产品：
*   **iPhone 17e**
*   **iPad (第12代)**：搭载A18芯片
*   **iPad Air**：搭载M4芯片
*   **MacBook Air**：搭载M5芯片
*   **MacBook Pro**：搭载M5 Pro和M5 Max芯片
*   **新款外部显示器**

## 春季（3月至4月）发布

预计在3月至4月期间，苹果将推出：
*   **全新改版Siri**：备受期待的Siri更新。
*   **新款智能家居显示器**：提供扬声器底座和壁挂选项。

## 秋季产品发布

按照惯例，秋季将是苹果发布新一代iPhone和Apple Watch的时间：
*   **新款Apple Watch**
*   **新款iPhone**
    *   **iPhone 18 Pro型号**：将放弃高通调制解调器，转而采用苹果自研的C1芯片。
    *   **首款可折叠iPhone**：预计也将在此期间首次亮相。

## 其他2026年新品

除了上述产品，2026年还有望看到：
*   **智能家居安防产品**：例如摄像头。
*   **新款Mac mini**：搭载M5芯片。
*   **新款Mac Studio**
*   **新款iPad mini**：配备OLED显示屏（iPad Pro的更新则要等到2027年）。

## 2026年底前展望

在2026年结束之前，苹果公司还可能揭示更多重磅产品：
*   **重新设计的MacBook Pro型号**：搭载M6 Pro和M6 Max芯片，采用更薄的机身、触控屏和OLED显示屏。
*   **智能眼镜产品预览**：供应商已在小批量生产，预示着该产品可能在年底前进行预览。

items.shortSummary: 根据彭博社马克·古尔曼的报告，苹果计划在2026年推出至少15款新产品，这将是公司关键的一年。新品涵盖iPhone 17e、搭载M系列芯片的iPad和MacBook、新款外部显示器。此外，还将有改版Siri、智能家居显示器、新款Apple Watch、iPhone 18 Pro（采用自研C1芯片）以及备受期待的首款可折叠iPhone。智能家居安防产品、Mac mini、Mac Studio和OLED iPad mini也在计划中。年底前，苹果可能发布重新设计的MacBook Pro和预览智能眼镜产品。
items.translated_title: 报告：苹果将于2026年推出这些新产品
items.content:
Apple is planning to launch at least 15 new products in 2026, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


Gurman outlined what to expect from Apple in 2026 in the latest edition of his "Power On" newsletter. He said the company is heading "into one of its most pivotal years in recent memory," with the rollout of major new Apple Intelligence features, intense regulatory pressure on the App Store, and the risk of new tariffs.

The "early portion of the year" should see the release of the iPhone 17e, iPad (12th-generation) with A18 chip, iPad Air with M4 chip, MacBook Air with M5 chip, MacBook Pro with M5 Pro and M5 Max chips, and new external displays. Around March to April, Apple should roll out the long-awaited revamped version of Siri alongside a new smart home display with speaker-base and wall-mount options.

In the fall, the company will release new Apple Watches and iPhones as usual. The iPhone 18 Pro models will drop Qualcommm modems for Apple's own C1 chip. The first foldable ‌iPhone‌ is also expected to launch.

The company is likely to debut smart home security products such as a camera in 2026. A new Mac mini with the M5 chip is also expected, along with a new Mac Studio. A new iPad mini with an OLED display should also arrive, but an update to the iPad Pro is not due until 2027.

Before the end of the year, the company could unveil redesigned ‌MacBook Pro‌ models with M6 Pro and M6 Max chips, thinner chassis, touchscreens, and OLED displays. Apple could also preview its smart glasses product before the end of 2026, with suppliers already producing small quantities.

Tags: Bloomberg, Mark Gurman

items.title: WhatsApp将增加对Passkey加密备份的支持 (原标题: WhatsApp to Add Support for Passkey-Encrypted Backups)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
### WhatsApp推出Passkey加密聊天备份

WhatsApp近日宣布，将为其聊天备份系统引入Passkey加密功能，旨在提升用户数据的安全性和便利性。

#### 主要特点与优势：

*   **简化认证方式**：用户现在可以使用设备的Touch ID或Face ID来保护其存储的消息，取代了之前需要创建和保存一个64位长密钥的繁琐过程。
*   **增强安全性**：
    *   该功能是WhatsApp 2021年推出的端到端加密备份系统的扩展。
    *   通过Passkey，认证过程利用设备内置的认证硬件（如Touch ID或Face ID），确保私钥永不离开手机，从而大大提高了备份的安全性。
*   **提升恢复便捷性**：由于认证过程的简化和安全性增强，聊天备份的恢复将变得更加容易。

#### 推出与启用：

*   **全球逐步推出**：此功能将在未来几周内在全球范围内逐步推出。
*   **启用步骤**：一旦可用，用户可以通过以下路径启用此功能：**设置 → 聊天 → 聊天备份 → 端到端加密备份**。
*   **存储目的地不变**：对于iOS用户，备份仍将存储在iCloud中；对于Android用户，则存储在Google Drive中。

#### 背景：

此举是Meta公司更广泛采纳Passkey策略的一部分。WhatsApp早在2023年就已支持Passkey用于账户登录。
items.shortSummary: WhatsApp宣布将推出Passkey加密聊天备份功能。用户将能通过Touch ID或Face ID保护其消息，取代了复杂的64位密钥。此举扩展了现有的端到端加密备份系统，确保私钥不离开设备，从而提升了备份的安全性和恢复的便捷性。该功能将在未来几周内全球逐步推出，用户可在设置中启用。这是Meta公司更广泛采key采用策略的一部分。
items.translated_title: WhatsApp将增加对Passkey加密备份的支持
items.content:
WhatsApp this week announced that it is adding passkey-encrypted chat backups, allowing users to protect their stored messages using Touch ID or Face ID instead of a 64-digit key.


The feature extends the app's 2021 end-to-end encrypted backup system, which previously required users to create and save a lengthy key to restore chats. With passkeys, authentication uses each device's built-in authentication hardware like ‌Touch ID‌ or ‌Face ID‌, meaning the private cryptographic key never leaves the phone. This makes backups both more secure and much easier to restore.

The rollout is set to be global and gradual over the coming weeks. Users can enable it via Settings → Chats → Chat backup → End-to-end encrypted backup once available. iCloud and Google Drive remain the storage destinations for iOS and Android, respectively. The move continues Meta's broader adoption of passkeys, which WhatsApp first supported for account logins in 2023.
Tag: WhatsApp
